Articles.Content: Is there a way to change the timeout for the the forum? This 15m timeout is killing posts.

If you don't check the "Remember Me" checkbox on login, the forum will automatically log you out after 15m of inactivity (i.e., 15m of not posting or loading a new page). I think that's what this refers to.

edit: spoke too soon. Increased it to twenty minutes, but because the forum depends on this setting for a number of things I won't raise it any further
